home.title: Pablo García Robredo
home.subtitle: Backend / Full Stack · APIs · Systems · Networks

about.title: About me
about.p1: I’m a backend-focused developer working mainly with Node.js and REST APIs, with an emphasis on maintainable code, debugging and understanding how systems behave in production. I enjoy designing APIs, modelling data and reasoning about edge cases rather than just making things “work”.
about.p2: My background in QA Automation gave me a strong foundation in logs, HTTP communication, API testing and incident analysis, which strongly influences how I approach backend development today. I tend to think in terms of reliability, failure scenarios and how technical decisions affect real users and production systems.
about.p3: Currently, I’m deepening my backend and infrastructure skills by building personal projects, working with Docker, MongoDB and Linux-based VPS environments, and reinforcing my knowledge of systems and networking to develop with a production-oriented mindset.

project.title: Recipe API APP
project.subtitle: Node/Express/Mongo + front React/TS. Modular architecture, shared types, and refactoring towards hooks.
project.stack: Stack: Node, Express, MongoDB, React, TS
